LittleDog::RobotReadInfo Struct Reference

#include <littledog.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Complete robot state as seen by the host computer.

Description:
RobotReadInfo contains all the information describing the state of the robot as seen by the host computer. The contents include information about battery state, each joint, each leg and all of the sensors, current status of the communication system as well as robot health.

 Default constructor.
